documents.document: Soft words barely spoken, Hard hearts softly broken.

The Phanton Penance,
Sorry, not sorry.
I need less of youphoria and more of mephoria.

I'm trying this new doom and exercise plan for 2017.
You keep running around in circles and crying all the time.
Works a treat.
@LexiIsAWriter @bevandeveire I have to let you go, my love. Close your eyes for the last time, the warmth of my kiss fading on your skin.
@notittryagain I used the painting as my profile pic on the corporate network a few years back, suffice to say, it was not well received 😱

@notittryagain
That's one of my fave paintings....
There can be no honor without 'u'.

I wish all of life's ills could be sorted by a band-aid and a hug from your mother.
Mine was a stone cold bitch and I turned up here.
I fell in love with the idea that women always felt sorry for men.

We wear the mask that grins and lies, It hides our cheeks and shades our eyes.
Paul Laurence Dunbar,
and Snapchat.
To dine is divine with wine from d'vine.

🎶 It's not the end of the girth as we know it 🎶
As my slim fit shirts silently mock me from behind closed doors.

🎶 Take me down to the Emerald City, Where the road is Gold, And the Witches ain't petty,
Whoa, Dotty, please take me home. 🎶

@bevandeveire @whereami18
"I can't bear to hear the sound of the stones weeping any more," she whispered quietly to herself.

the unintended abstraction of the incidental line,
as my fingertip traces along the curves.
Lies as target goals and other milestones in the therapeutic relationship.

'A word to the wise',
The wise are wary of words.

"This is a stick up."
"You're a sly old dog, Punch", blushes Judy.
Self reflection is a disaster when your muse is blind.

@bevandeveire @E_Ville13
"Major Tom to Ground Control, I'd like to report a problem with my protein pills."

@MunkMania
None of us were, but the world doesn't know that...

i found the place where the butterflies have broken wings,
it's not likely, i'll return there,
my dreams won't let me.
Schrödinger and his cat can teach a lesson on mental wellness and illness when you ask "how are you?" as a social convention. #BellLetsTalk
Imagine having the restraint not to be a condescending twat on twitter.

the moon behind the clouds,
"come out, you coward,"
"stop being what you are,"
"be something different,"
lamented the wolf.
we all hope differently
It's hard to be happy in a world where the body politic gets caught in a lie and there's genuine surprise.

Erase all existence from between your legs baby,
We're in for a bumpy ride.

In~auger~ation
A time of being screwed.
We are drawn into our lives. As shades. Coloured perfect, Destined to fade. Exposed to life corporeal.

@bevandeveire @charmfoz @Tsvi_Stern
Okay, if you say so, I still can't see how you get a silk purse from a sow's ear...

I saw an amnestic fortune teller yesterday,
all she kept saying was "forget about it."
"You know the only time you can suck the marrow from your bones is when you're dead." "Now tell me more about how you left your past behind"
food for thought, hungry for nothing.

it struck me,
as i admired you,
you are beyond sin.

The sharp end of anything really matters.
Sticks. Blades. Wits. Tongues. Minds.
The top of your head.

Him: "it's because you're always correcting me"
Her: "no, I'm not"
Him: ........
The problem is you can't go to a neutral corner in a circle when there's a knockout.

Women have four basic body types:
Ectomorph Mesomorph Endomorph and Mighty Morph.

I like it when it's off the cuff,
It's even better when the collar matches.

Chinese New Year and an Inauguration.
Coincidence... https://t.co/MKt2F11JlN
the goal is to know her back to front..
stop struggling, the waves will not grip you any tighter, take your breath away quicker, lay you to rest any faster.

mark my words,
it's time to heel.

I can't be your hell,
I don't know what it is to be divine.

give up your eyes to the raven,
let it show you your true destiny.
Stop breaking bread, as hard as I try 'breaking a leg' was the well wish.

I called her vagina "The Grand Canyon" because it's a natural wonder of the world.
Take a compliment, whydon'tcha?
When you realise you're walking behind someone you don't want to see and you end up walking even slower than they are...

You speak with confidence,
Come back when you speak results.

not everything in this world is a ruse,
unless you're more than one kangaroo.
i am the flash bulb of digital photography

Fitting into the box,
Thinking outside the square,
Running around the rhombus.
"Build it, and he will come"
Gee. Ometry (1700's)
There's nothing to be known from trying to know it all.
You must not believe how courteous he can be as he distracts you, while craftily separating your heart strings from your bodily attachments.

"My name is Destanknee"
"The 'k' is silent."
"K."

The news is FAKE?
There go my childish dreams of truth, justice and the libertine way.

"It's nothing to laugh about about."
You mean right now, today?
"It's everything to laugh about."

I gave up on the life coach,
Preferred the somber ambience of the death coach.

If you've got stars in your eyes,
Park the seeing eye dog and have your cataracts done ffs.
Wonton Soup > Wanton Sop

Love isn't dead,
It's just, aghast, wtf, agog, you're kidding, whatever...

Being corrupt isn't such a bad thing,
If I wasn't so easily lead astray.
"You need to lighten up" he exclaimed in perfect castrato, huffing on the next helium ballon.
The monopoly does not have a monopoly on healing.

Weaving through my funeral cortège.
An autobiographical note.
The subtlety of the sublingual message.

@bevandeveire @Love_bug1016 @GinAndJif
I wish the sun would come out, my hair net will never dry.
Having my way with words, leads me to think that I'm perverse.

Sinking in the hole is easy,
Pulling it in on top of you may take a while.
goatees are for men who like to butt
It's the 53rd week of the year, when will this infernal leap year thing ever end?

Now that the ball has dropped for 2017, can the party in your pants take it down a notch or two?
I'd like to look away, eventually.

The living and the dead.
Christmas dinner leftovers today, at the Schrödinger's house.
twitter is ruefully employed, if anyone asks.
It's safe in Australia, so far 2016 💥💥➡️ 2017 🎉🎉
Like all primates, I'm just throwing my 140 characters randomly at the universe and hoping that some of it sticks. After taking a big sniff.

I watched someone close give up the will to live this year, she'd done her time.
Never doubt the strength (either way) of the human spirit.

You bring out the willing victim in all of us.
You know who you are....

@turtledumplin
Rouge One?

@turtledumplin
The sun's just setting in my neck of the woods.

@bevandeveire @charmfoz @willowwakko
The Cheshire Cat had changed for the last time and lost her smile.

Old habits run deep and die hard.
It's not a Christmas movie McClane.

@jdforshort
How tall are you?

@PFitzpa
Does it involve bananas, pairs and stairs?
Spring, 1692 Salem, it's been a hella year, can't wait for 1693......

Is it 'blithering' or 'blathering'?
I want my application as a Supreme Court Justice to sound well credentialed.
I dreamt that I found another word that ended in 'amt'.

Wanted:
a guile to be,
no promises implied,
all efforts applied.

'Do unto others,'
"No, that doesn't look right."
'Do untie others,'
"Yes, all in good time."
Friction improves everything.
desires are the ants that crawl under your skin

@BrainPornNinja
Okay, I'm in bit of time warp/loop thingy...
knee deep in ashes is not the time to refute your penchant for licking the flames

@ohmygrapeness
Ataxia : lack of muscle coordination which may affect speech, walking, picking up objects from drinking too much Ataraxia.
Has anyone else thought that The Queen has passed on and they're keeping her on ice until 2017? Anus Horriblis and all that?
Missilletoe is akin to hammertoe in that you lift off before you can't touch this....nailed it.🔨

I'd like to kiss my maker,
Except this time,
I'd be brave enough to keep my eyes open.
